title: Set favicon to the user-uploaded image

requirements.text: Replace the existing favicon and apple-touch-icon static assets with versions derived from the user-uploaded image (image-3.png), keeping the same filenames and paths currently referenced by frontend/index.html.

quotes: can you put the favicon to the image I uploaded? (image.png)

acceptanceCriteria: The files /assets/generated/dinigc-favicon.dim_64x64.png and /assets/generated/dinigc-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png are regenerated from image-3.png and included in the frontend build output.
frontend/index.html continues to reference exactly these paths: /assets/generated/dinigc-favicon.dim_64x64.png and /assets/generated/dinigc-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png.
After deployment, the browser tab icon reflects the uploaded image, and adding the site to a mobile home screen uses the updated apple-touch icon.

edits: Replace the icon artwork with the uploaded dinosaur head image (dinigc-favicon.dim_64x64.png > dinigc-favicon.dim_64x64.png)
Replace the icon artwork with the uploaded dinosaur head image (dinigc-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png > dinigc-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
